messages.message:
the home page looks slightly off on aihub-sandbox - @Subash when you’re back online since it seems these changes were introduced in https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/59389
• the “Good afternoon, Serena” text is not visible unless in short screens, and the lack of a background image makes the text unreadable
• the search CTA is not aligned with the Converse CTA below
I chatted with Subash about this this morning - the home page refresh is going to be GA'ed before the code cut, so users will never see this without the home page refresh
following up on this. I noticed that there were some inconsistencies when using dark mode (see recording). I updated to look like the screenshot — let me know your thoughts @Subash

separately — unfortunately it looks like this current image doesn’t have a transparent background ( I took a look in the figma designs as well) so it looks off in dark mode. However the figma also showed this alternative illustration, which seems to work in both light and dark mode

1. Thanks for fixing these dark mode inconsistencies. This changes were explicitly added when we were working with a different background image. With the new background, we should fallback to the pollen theme colors. I still a gray bottom to the background which should ideally be transparent. I will check with TJ on this.
2. New illustration just came in tonight. I was planning to update it in my morning.
Thanks for working on these changes, @Arjun. If you can share the PR, I can get it backported to 24.26
